Container.Name: code
Container.Overview: Code-server is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser.[ul][li]Code on your Chromebook, tablet, and laptop with a consistent dev environment.[/li][li]If you have a Windows or Mac workstation, more easily develop for Linux.[/li][li]Take advantage of large cloud servers to speed up tests, compilations, downloads, and more.[/li][li]Preserve battery life when you're on the go.[/li][li]All intensive computation runs on your server.[/li][li]You're no longer running excess instances of Chrome.[/li][/ul[br][br][b][a href="https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-code-server#application-setup"]Click here for first time set up details[/a][/b]
